com.ibasco.agql.protocols.valve.source.query.rcon

Class SourceRcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibasco.agql.protocols.valve.source.query.rcon.SourceRcon

  • @ApiStatus.Internal
public final class SourceRcon
extends Object
    A collection of global constants and utility methods used internally by the RCON module
    Author:
    Rafael Luis Ibasco

      • isInitialTerminatorPacket

        public static boolean isInitialTerminatorPacket(SourceRconPacket packet)
        Check if the packet is the primary terminator packet (The first terminator packet sent after a request)
        Parameters:
        packet - SourceRconPacket to check
        Returns:
        true if the rcon packet is the initial terminator packet (byte terminator value of 0x0)

      • isTerminatorPacket

        Check if packet is a valid terminator packet
        Parameters:
        packet - The SourceRconPacket to check
        Returns:
        true if the packet is a terminator packet

        Checks if the rcon request id represents a terminator packet

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        public static boolean isSecondaryTerminatorPacket(SourceRconPacket packet)
        Check if the packet is the secondary terminator packet (The secondary terminator packet sent after a request)
        Parameters:
        packet - SourceRconPacket to check
        Returns:
        true if the rcon packet is the initial terminator packet (byte terminator value of 0x01)
